name: Pinball Frenzy 3D Pro
description:
Pinball Flipper 3D establishes a new standard about on-device pinball games, thanks to its hyper-realistic physic and the quality of its graphics and sound ambience.

Features:
-Extra balls
-Multi-balls
-Awesome combos and neon effects
-Hi-Fi Sound Effects and Musics
-Worldwide Leaderboard

Find back the atmosphere of the best pub games et make proof of dexterity and ability like at the great era of pinball madness!
